thread.title: You'll Want to Walk Down the Aisle to the Violin Version of Gaga's "Bad Romance"
thread.title_full: You'll Want to Walk Down the Aisle to the Violin Version of Gaga's "Bad Romance"

author: Caitlin Hacker
title: You'll Want to Walk Down the Aisle to the Violin Version of Gaga's "Bad Romance"
text:
Genius Super Bowl Ad 2017 You'll Want to Walk Down the Aisle to the Violin Version of Gaga's "Bad Romance" February 5, 2017 by Caitlin Hacker 168 Shares 
Lady Gaga killed it when she performed the halftime show at the Super Bowl on Sunday, but her night didn't end when the second half started. Shortly after her performance, the TV show Genius aired their commercial for the series premiere. In the ad, an Albert Einstein look-alike plays the violin to a beautifully slowed-down version of Lady Gaga's "Bad Romance." While the song is about, well, a bad romance, this version is beautiful enough to walk down the aisle to. Related:
